summary: You’re a Rainbow It is 2009 and Dan is feeling anxious about what his relationship with Phil means, because he really doesn't...
body:
You’re a Rainbow

It is 2009 and Dan is feeling anxious about what his relationship with Phil means, because he really doesn’t want to be bisexual. Can Phil help Dan find peace with his feelings of “the label just talks over me.”

Based on Rainbow by Dodie Clark

I do not cast aspirations on Dan and Phil.

Rating: G

AO3

summary: Phil is so damn intelligent and honestly I don’t blame him for holding onto that child-like wonder. He’s a full grown-ass man...
body:
Phil is so damn intelligent and honestly I don’t blame him for holding onto that child-like wonder. He’s a full grown-ass man and knows what “the real world” is like and still tries to see the positive side in everything. He doesn’t waste his time on useless things, instead he indulges in things that make him happy like Netflix series and video games.

Sure, he has to write professional emails and make business calls and work meetings but at the end of the day he goes home with someone who makes him happy and let’s himself enjoy things that make him happy.

blog.name: phanfeed-ao3
blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

title: Phil and the Leather Tramp
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2tXVbNq

by BreanneKay

Phil had always wanted to travel the world, so after he turns 18 and inherits his part of the Lester fortune, that’s exactly what he does. After he has seen everything Europe has to offer he sets his sights on the United States, but a city in northern Colorado sucks him into it’s rich culture. Boulder has it’s hold on Phil and he can’t seem to leave even after spening two years in his homey flat, that is until he meets a street traveller named Dan. Could this filthy, sarcastic, keyboard playing leather tramp give Phil a reason to leave, or will he be just another dirty kid passing through the life he’s built at the base of the rockies?

Words: 2392, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Dan Howell, Phil Lester, Original Characters
  • Relationships: Dan Howell/Phil Lester, Dan Howell & Phil Lester
  • Additional Tags: Slow Burn, Getting Together, Homeless Dan Howell, Rich Phil Lester, Travel


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2tXVbNq

tags: please send in your moments for this person
summary: In the last anon you said that we rarely see Phil true softness/sweetness ... so I had to ask what are your favorite Phil soft...
question: In the last anon you said that we rarely see Phil true softness/sweetness ... so I had to ask what are your favorite Phil soft moments?  Ps: I love your blog and I love you 💕💜 Ps 2: I hope you had a great day 💕
answer: hey friend! i’m really sorry i didn’t answer earlier, i was trying to put together a list of moments, but unfortunately i just don’t have the mental energy to do it today, i’m so so sorry, i really tried:( i am very touched by your kind words, and maybe some other people might want to chime in on this? i’ll try to make a list later, ok? i’m so sorry:(

title: Afire Violet
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2ISKjFp

by horrordnp

When Dan Howell catches word of fires being set near his home, he’s not wrong to suspect there are Reds, or those marked as societal threats, behind it. Dan, himself, is a Blue, regardless of whether he wishes circumstances were different. But when Dan keeps accidentally running into a strange, black haired Red on his property, he begins to wonder if maybe the Blues aren’t the good guys after all.

Words: 2657, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

blog.name: twentyonetryagains
blog.title: dont be fooled i like football
blog.description: “Cause all my kindness was taken for weakness" - KANYE | Ireland

body:
2015 phan

Nahh idc what anyone says, 2014/2015 phan was the best period. It was WILD.


I remember getting excited over the stupidest/most platonic things.

New phans don’t understand that “evidence” was a lot harder to find from 2015 and downwards. Dan definitely didn’t say he liked to suck dick, there was no double live shows, no “daddy” comments or kinky references (and if there was it would have been very discreet)


I remember when they went to Japan for the first time, fuck. It was like they got engaged (rumour has it they diddd but that’s another story).

2015 (like many of you will know) phan wasn’t like 2012 phan though, where it was like walking on egg shells, 2015 was very “hush, hush” but in a sly way, it was secretive - nothing was in black and white. The chase was fun. The little Easter eggs they gave us, was exciting.


Now though they’re literally boyfriends, there’s no denying it. A blind man could tell. It’s not fun anymore.

blog.name: dearphillie
blog.title: you're such a strange person
blog.description:
[Ray | 19 | he/him] 
i wonder how much i would have accomplished in 8 years if it weren't for dan and phil

summary: so there's a blog sending asks about dan... specifically, their blog is a 'hate-blog' for dan howell. i deleted my previous post...
body:
so there’s a blog sending asks about dan… specifically, their blog is a ‘hate-blog’ for dan howell. i deleted my previous post answering that ask because 1. didn’t wanna give them the attention or satisfaction, and 2. i thought it was initially a joke but then i seen their blog.. there’s a lot of nasty things said on there about dan, none of it is “constructive criticism” it’s flat out hate. they even went as far as tagging dnp themselves. though i don’t think dnp see the posts at all and i think they blog is just looking for attention and drama, it’s still a terrible thing to read– especially for their fanbase if dan is someone they look up to.

please, to anyone who received any of those asks, don’t respond. just delete them.
